means: 埃尼威托克岛（西太平洋）

sentence.Network_en: United States detonated her first hydrogen bomb, at Eniwetok Atoll in the Marshall Islands in mid - Pacific.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国在太平洋中部绍尔群岛的埃尼威托克环礁爆炸第一颗氢弹.

means.word_mean: 1. an atoll in the Marshall islands; site of an amphibious assault in World War II; later used by the United States to test atomic bombs
2. World War II (February 1944); American infantry landed and captured a Japanese stronghold
